    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <entry>cahi1:data_dfca2602b9b69001f4ee00ed12a32a99d201af6f</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy transformation diagram in a light bulb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energietransformation Diagramm in einer 
Glühlampe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diagramme de transformation d'énergie dans une 
ampoule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diagrama da transformação da energia em um 
bulbo claro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schema di trasformazione di energia in una 
lampadina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάγραμμα ενεργειακού μετασχηματισμού σε έναν ελαφρύ 
βολβό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diagrama de la transformación de la energía en 
una bombilla</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an energy  transformation diagram in a light bulb. Electrical energy transferred to a light bulb is equal to the energy transferred from the light bulb (heat and light).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Energietransformation 
Diagramm in einer Glühlampe. Die elektrische Energie, die auf 
eine Glühlampe übertragen wird, ist der Energie gleich, die von der 
Glühlampe übertragen wird (Hitze und Licht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un diagramme de 
transformation d'énergie dans une ampoule. L'énergie 
électrique transférée à une ampoule est égale à l'énergie 
transférée à partir de l'ampoule (la chaleur et lumière).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um diagrama da 
transformação da energia em um bulbo claro. A energia 
elétrica transferida a um bulbo claro é igual à energia transferida
do bulbo claro (calor e luz).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra uno schema di 
trasformazione di energia in una lampadina. L'energia elettrica 
trasferita ad una lampadina è uguale all'energia trasferita dalla 
lampadina (calore e luce).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει διάγραμμα ενεργειακού 
μετασχηματισμού σε έναν ελαφρύ βολβό. Η ηλεκτρική ενέργεια
που μεταφέρεται σε έναν ελαφρύ βολβό είναι ίση με την ενέργεια 
που μεταφέρεται από τον ελαφρύ βολβό (θερμότητα και φως).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un diagrama de la 
transformación de la energía en una bombilla. La energía 
eléctrica transferida a una bombilla es igual a la energía 
transferida de la bombilla (calor y luz).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energietransformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">thermische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transformation d'énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie thermique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">calor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia elettrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trasformazione di energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">calore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia termica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">luz</string>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
